flavorText:
"What has neither mouth nor throat, yet swallows captain, crew, and boat?"
—Sphinx's riddle

foreignData.flavorText: „Was hat weder Maul noch Zähne und verschlingt doch ganze Kähne?" —Rätsel der Sphinx
foreignData.name: Rache der Meeresgöttin
foreignData.text: Bringe bis zu drei Kreaturen deiner Wahl, die deine Gegner kontrollieren, auf die Hand ihrer Besitzer zurück. Hellsicht 1. (Schaue dir die oberste Karte deiner Bibliothek an. Du kannst diese Karte unter deine Bibliothek legen.)

foreignData.flavorText: "De boca carece y masticar no sabe, pero engulle al capitán, a la tripulación y a la nave". —Acertijo de la Esfinge
foreignData.name: Venganza de la diosa del mar
foreignData.text: Regresa hasta tres criaturas objetivo que controlan tus oponentes a las manos de sus propietarios. Adivina 1. (Mira la primera carta de tu biblioteca. Puedes poner esa carta en el fondo de tu biblioteca.)

foreignData.flavorText: « Qu'est-ce qui, sans gueule ni gosier, engloutit néanmoins capitaine, équipage et navire ? » —Énigme du sphinx
foreignData.name: Revanche de la déesse de la Mer
foreignData.text: Renvoyez jusqu'à trois créatures ciblées que vos adversaires contrôlent dans les mains de leurs propriétaires. Regard 1. (Regardez la carte du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Vous pouvez mettre cette carte au-dessous de votre bibliothèque.)

foreignData.flavorText: "Cosa non ha bocca né gola, ma ingoia capitano, equipaggio e nave?" —Indovinello della Sfinge
foreignData.name: Vendetta della Dea del Mare
foreignData.text: Fai tornare fino a tre creature bersaglio controllate dai tuoi avversari in mano ai rispettivi proprietari. Profetizza 1. (Guarda la prima carta del tuo grimorio. Puoi mettere quella carta in fondo al tuo grimorio.)

foreignData.flavorText: 「口も喉も無いのに、船長や船員ごと船を飲み込めるものとは何ぞ？」 ――スフィンクスのなぞなぞ
foreignData.name: 海神の復讐
foreignData.text: 対戦相手がコントロールするクリーチャーを最大３体まで対象とし、それらをオーナーの手札に戻す。占術１を行う。（あなたのライブラリーの一番上のカードを見る。あなたはそのカードをあなたのライブラリーの一番下に置いてもよい。）

foreignData.flavorText: "이것은 입도 없고 목구멍도 없다. 하지만 선장과 선원, 배를 통째로 삼킨다. 이것은 무엇인가?" —스핑크스의 수수께끼
foreignData.name: 바다신의 복수
foreignData.text: 당신의 상대들이 조종하는 생물을 최대 세 개까지 목표로 정한다. 그 생물들을 소유자의 손으로 되돌린다. 점술 1. (당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 한 장을 본다. 당신은 그 카드를 당신의 서고 맨 밑에 놓을 수 있다.)

foreignData.flavorText: "O que é que, sem boca e sem goela, engole capitão, tripulação e navio com mastro e vela?" — Enigma da esfinge
foreignData.name: Vingança da Deusa do Mar
foreignData.text: Devolva até três criaturas alvo que seus oponentes controlam para as mãos de seus donos. Vidência 1. (Olhe o card do topo de seu grimório. Você pode colocar aquele card no fundo de seu grimório.)

foreignData.flavorText: «Нету ни горла, ни рта, ни зубов, но проглотит корабль и всех моряков». — загадка сфинкса
foreignData.name: Месть Морской Богини
foreignData.text: Верните не более трех целевых существ под контролем ваших оппонентов в руки их владельцев. Предскажите 1. (Посмотрите верхнюю карту вашей библиотеки. Вы можете положить ту карту в низ вашей библиотеки.)

foreignData.flavorText: 「什么东西没嘴没喉，却能连人带船一口吞下？」 ～史芬斯的谜语
foreignData.name: 海神的复仇
foreignData.text: 将至多三个目标由对手操控的生物分别移回其拥有者手上。占卜1。（检视你牌库顶的牌。你可以将该牌置于你的牌库底。）

foreignData.flavorText: 「什麼東西沒嘴沒喉，卻能連人帶船一口吞下？」 ～史芬斯的謎語
foreignData.name: 海神的復仇
foreignData.text: 將至多三個目標由對手操控的生物分別移回其擁有者手上。占卜1。（檢視你牌庫頂的牌。你可以將該牌置於你的牌庫底。）

name: Sea God's Revenge
originalText: Return up to three target creatures your opponents control to their owners' hands. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

rulings.text: You can cast Sea God’s Revenge with no targets. If you do, you’ll scry 1 when it resolves. If you choose at least one target, and all chosen targets are illegal when Sea God’s Revenge tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen.
In multiplayer games, the three target creatures can be controlled by different opponents.

When you scry, you may put all the cards you look at back on top of your library, you may put all of those cards on the bottom of your library, or you may put some of those cards on top and the rest of them on the bottom.
You choose how to order cards returned to your library after scrying no matter where you put them.
You perform the actions stated on a card in sequence. For some spells and abilities, that means you’ll scry last. For others, that means you’ll scry and then perform other actions.

Scry appears on some spells and abilities with one or more targets. If all of the spell or ability’s targets are illegal when it tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won’t scry.

text: Return up to three target creatures your opponents control to their owners' hands. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
